summary:
15 year international procurement/ supply chain experience of which I worked 9 years in the liquid oils and fats and shea supply, 3 years in the cocoa industry, 2 years in the animal feed industry and  little more than a year in the biofuels industry. 
	
Have both experience with managing departments in procurement, planning, transport and storage but also on execution of the day- to- day tasks.

Lead negotiations and supplier management for procurement of raw materials, logistics services such as bulk marine transport, truck and container transport, production capacity, storage capacity at storage terminals and warehouses + set up of logistics agreements. 

Experienced in change management, set up and improvement of several business and IT processes and working in cross functional teams. 

Organizer with eye for details, analytical, problem solving and do not give up easily.

I set up a department by recruiting, coaching and developing of skills and knowledge from the people in my team. My way of working has a focus on continuous improvement of the department, third party Logistics service providers and suppliers. In case there is an issue, my aim is work together as partners on the solution and corrective measure.

Reviewed and improved working procedures with several 3PL resulting in a better cooperation and service.

Part of project team as business expert for implementation of SAP R/3 Material Management  (MM) module. The MM module supports purchasing, goods receiving, material storage and inventory management. Further I was involved in the set-up of Production Planning module for my planning department.  PP Module involves production planning, Sales & Operations Planning (S&OP) and  Material Requirements Planning (MRP). Knowledge of ITAS and J D Edwards ERP 

Bachelor degree in Commercial Economics from HZ University of Applied Sciences, Flushing
